TopicTitle: I Won A Space Race With My Dad

Articles.Content:
I convinced my father to download Kerbal, so we decided to try to race to the Mun. He was building ridiculously huge rockets, but having played several months, I knew smaller was better, so I went the sensible route. By the time I was in orbit around the Mun, he hadn't even gotten out of the atmosphere yet. The landing took me three attempts, but I landed. Dad was kinda pissed, but he accepted my victory.

To be fair, it was his first day, so we'll probably race again one day...
Nice touch playing with your dad. Tell him to shoot me a PM and I'll tell him all about MechJeb so he can be all set for that rematch.
